name: IdleKarting
description:
Have you ever had Karting Stadium with Tons of Cars in all over the world?

Please welcome the New Manager...

- Unlock new TRACKS
- Unlock new WORLDS
- Unlock new karting CARS
- Upgrade your STADIUM
- Attract RACE LOVERS to your STADIUM
- Manage the stadium TICKET price
- Hire The MOST FAMOUS LEADER in the world
- Meet The BEST DRIVER In The World With His GOLD Car
- Upgrade Tracks to MAKE MILLIONS OF DOLLARS !!!!

Are You Ready?!
